name: hanlunwang.tech

projects.title: Factors Affecting Movie Grossing and Prediction

aboutpara: I am a Toronto-based Full-Stack Web App Developer with a passion for technology, particularly in the realms of Data Science, Artificial Intelligence, and Machine Learning. My technical arsenal includes proficiency in languages such as Python, JavaScript, Java, SQL, C, and C++, and a deep understanding of frameworks and databases like React, Flask, Oracle, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB. I am adept at leveraging tools such as AWS, GCP, PyTorch, Spark, Airflow, Unix, Git, and Jira to build robust, scalable applications. My work is driven by a desire to integrate AI and ML technologies into web development, pushing the boundaries of traditional web applications to create more intelligent, efficient, and user-focused solutions.

resume.tagline: üëã  I'm a full-stack web app developer.
resume.description: I have delivered world-class user experiences to millions of people. Well-versed with React, Javascript, and most of the Web frameworks.

experiences.position: Full-Stack Developer at University of Toronto
experiences.bullets: Spearheaded the redesign of app architecture from Monolithic to Serverless. Engineered and deployed the serverless app on AWS Amplify for easier authentication and automatic scaling, reducing operational costs by 30%. | Revamped Single Page Application using React, JavaScript, HTML, and Tailwind CSS in Next.js framework for server-side rendering, reducing page load times by 44%. | Applied caching strategies and lazy loading, reducing server load by 25% and enhancing user experience. | Improved processing speed and accuracy by 30% by utilizing AWS Lambda in Python and leveraging AWS S3 for scalable storage solutions. | Integrated AWS SQS and SNS for asynchronous data extraction, reducing waiting time by 60%. | Orchestrated cross-functional team collaboration by introducing Agile and Scrum methodologies and established CI/CD pipelines, resulting in a 20% acceleration in product iteration cycle.

experiences.position: Full-Stack Developer at Forum Custom Builder
experiences.bullets: Constructed a web application using React and JavaScript. Implemented a custom Redux middleware to optimize API request handling, resulting in a 15% faster API response times and a 20% quicker page loading. | Architected a robust back-end with Java, Spring Boot, and PostgreSQL, creating RESTful APIs that streamlined client-server communication, improving application efficiency by 30%. | Designed and integrated a comprehensive dashboard using D3.js and WebSockets to track order status and visualize key metrics, ensuring real-time data flow and boosting operational visibility by 40%. | Orchestrated CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins, Maven, and Docker, automating build, test, and deployment processes, reducing deployment time by 50% and ensuring consistent and reliable application delivery. | Conducted thorough unit, integration, and API testing with JUnit, Mockito, and Postman, ensuring superior code quality and reducing bug rates by 25%.

experiences.position: Developer Intern at Logitech Technology Co Ltd
experiences.bullets: Programmed Java applications using JDBC and c3p0 connection pool to perform ETL on millions of data records, improving database connection management and reducing connection latency by 35%. | Enhanced Oracle database performance by optimizing SQL queries, resulting in a 25% reduction in query execution time and a 20% increase in overall system performance. | Configured Apache Airflow in Python to automate and manage data ETL pipelines, reducing manual intervention by 40% and improving data processing efficiency by 30%. | Wrote comprehensive JUnit tests to ensure high code quality and reliability, and participated in Scrum methodologies, contributing to a 15% decrease in bug rates and a 20% increase in sprint velocity.

education.universityPara: Master of Science in Electrical Engineering
Bachelor of Science in Physics and Computer Science
